nodes.excerpt: KooKit is a breakthrough MagSafe accessory that cools your phone while keeping it wirelessly charged. It tweaks between battery life and performance of your phone to make it run at its peak state for a prolonged period of time.
nodes.title: KooKit - Keep your phone cool & wirelessly charge at the same time
nodes.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: KooKit是一款突破性的MagSafe配件，在保持无线充电的同时，还能为手机降温。它能在电池寿命和手机性能之间进行调整，使手机长时间运行在最佳状态。
localize.tagline: 保持手机凉爽，同时进行无线充电

localize.description: KooKit是一款突破性的MagSafe配件，在保持無線充電的同時，還能爲手機降溫。它能在電池壽命和手機性能之間進行調整，使手機長時間運行在最佳狀態。
localize.tagline: 保持手機涼爽，同時進行無線充電

nodes.excerpt: Remotion allows you to make real MP4 videos written in React. Use web technologies like CSS, SVG, WebGL to make interesting motion graphics. Use programming to dynamically make different variants of videos and automate it using server-side rendering.
nodes.title: Remotion - Create videos programmatically in React
nodes.author: Jonny Burger

localize.description: Remotion可以让你用React编写真正的MP4视频。使用CSS、SVG、WebGL等网络技术来制作有趣的运动图形。使用编程动态地制作不同变体的视频，并使用服务器端渲染实现自动化。
localize.tagline: 在React中以编程方式创建视频

localize.description: Remotion可以讓你用React編寫真正的MP4視頻。使用CSS、SVG、WebGL等網絡技術來製作有趣的運動圖形。使用編程動態地製作不同變體的視頻，並使用服務器端渲染實現自動化。
localize.tagline: 在React中以編程方式創建視頻

nodes.excerpt: The all-new MacKeeper 5 includes cleaning, performance, protection, and privacy tools. Organize your Mac by freeing up gigabytes of space on your hard drive while protecting you from viruses, malware, and identity theft. The best part - the app is super easy to use.

nodes.excerpt: Translate words straight from your Alfred launcher: - Open Alfred - Type a language combination and a word: `fren fromage` - Press enter to open the results page on WordReference! Get access to 48 dictionaries across 18 different languages!
nodes.title: WordReference for Alfred - Multilingual translations at your fingertips!
nodes.author: Alex Martin

localize.description: 直接从您的Alfred启动器翻译单词： - 打开Alfred - 输入语言组合和单词：`fren fromage` - 按回车键打开WordReference上的结果页面! 获得跨越18种不同语言的48种词典的访问权限!
localize.tagline: 多语种翻译触手可及!

localize.description: 直接從您的Alfred啓動器翻譯單詞： - 打開Alfred - 輸入語言組合和單詞：`fren fromage` - 按回車鍵打開WordReference上的結果頁面! 獲得跨越18種不同語言的48種詞典的訪問權限!

nodes.title:
Let’s say Elon Musk just claims he is Satoshi

I mean at this point both bitcoin and Tesla would spike another 20% from that alone right?
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
比方说，埃隆-马斯克只是声称他是Satoshi。

我的意思是，此时比特币和特斯拉都会因为这一点再飙升20%吧？

比方說，埃隆-馬斯克只是聲稱他是Satoshi。

我的意思是，此時比特幣和特斯拉都會因爲這一點再飆升20%吧？

nodes.title:
SPACs have been very lucrative for the sponsor.

"The average SPAC sponsor return less concessions, forfeiture and vesting over the last two years was 648%."

From Michael Cembalest at JPM https://t.co/OxCgvYJeKX
nodes.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
SPACs对赞助商来说是非常有利可图的。

"过去两年，SPAC保荐人的平均回报率减去让步、没收和归属，为648%。"

来自JPM的Michael Cembalest https://t.co/OxCgvYJeKX

SPACs對贊助商來說是非常有利可圖的。

"過去兩年，SPAC保薦人的平均回報率減去讓步、沒收和歸屬，爲648%。"

來自JPM的Michael Cembalest https://t.co/OxCgvYJeKX
